tha-ap402:10.4: Āgacchuṃ buddhasantikaṃ → upagacchuṃ tadā jinaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); āgañchuṃ buddhasantike (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap402:23.2: aṭṭhadīpaphalena … jayissantimaṃ jantū → aṭṭhadīpaphalena ca. upaṭṭhissantimaṃ jantuṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed), aṭṭhadīpaphalena hi. na jahissantimaṃ jantuṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed), aṭṭha dīpā phalena hi. na jahissanti maṃ jantuṃ (?)
